name: Piazzolla
description: Piazzolla is a type system intended for optimizing the available space in press media and other publications. It has a compact appearance which allows for small font sizes and tight leading while achieving solid lines and robust paragraphs. It has a distinctive voice that conveys a personal style, especially in display sizes. It has great performance and readability in small point sizes and long texts, both for screen and printing. Designed by Juan Pablo del Peral for Huerta Tipográfica . To contribute see github.com/huertatipografica/piazzolla .
author: Juan Pablo del Peral, Huerta Tipográfica
